name: Giant Hornet
description:
The life of a newborn queen hornet is a simulator. The difficulties it goes through to grow up and become a giant hornet are presented in the game. To do this, it must first stay away from the enemy hornets that destroy her nest, and when the time comes, it will come back for revenge when she becomes a giant hornet. The newborn hornet must hunt in the wild forest in order to grow and develop. But it has many competitors who want to eat it, wasps, giant spiders, praying mantises.

When she grows up enough, she will become an extraordinary queen giant hornet, and this queen hornet will build her own nest and raise new hornets. It is necessary to fight hard together with the queen and her son hornets to destroy the enemy and become the ruler of the whole forest.

Key features in the simulation:
-Survive: Hide from your enemies in the jungle.
-Hunting: Hunt the jungle killers: spiders, wasps, praying mantises and honeybees.
-Build: Collect beeswax to build your own nest.
-Get stronger: Complete missions to become faster and more energetic.
-Propagate: We need to breed new hornets.
-Revenge: Become the strongest of the jungle to destroy your enemies.
